item.title: Spanish tennis player Rafael Nadal to return at Paris Masters
item.description: Spanish tennis player Rafael Nadal to return at Paris Masters Nadal will return to competition at next weekâ€™s Paris Masters before taking his place at the season-ending ATP Finals, coach Carlos Moya said.

item.title: Tennis players Storm Sanders, Luisa Stefani win Guadalajara Open doubles title
item.description: Tennis players Storm Sanders, Luisa Stefani win Guadalajara Open doubles title Sanders-Stefani won their first team title at the Guadalajara Open Akron on Sunday, defeating Anna Danilina and Beatriz Haddad Maia 7-6(4), 6-7(3), 10-8 in the final.

item.title: Felix Auger-Aliassime clinches Antwerp title
item.description: Felix Auger-Aliassime clinches Antwerp title Felix Auger-Aliassime gave his hopes of qualifying for the ATP Finals a lift by winning his second title in as many weeks with victory over Sebastian Korda in Antwerp

item.title: Belgian tennis player Maryna Zanevska captures WTA 125 Rouen championship

item.title: Zhang Zhizhen becomes first-ever Chinese man to enter ATP top 100
item.description: Zhang Zhizhen becomes first-ever Chinese man to enter ATP top 100 Zhang Zhizhen became the first ever Chinese man to break into the ATP top 100 next week despite losing his Naples quarterfinal with Mackenzie McDonald.
